name: Kismet
description: Deploy a Kismet wireless sensor node for RF monitoring and packet capture.
author: Watchgrid System

config_fields.name: HTTP_USERNAME
config_fields.description: Web interface username for Kismet dashboard access.

config_fields.name: HTTP_PASSWORD
config_fields.description: Web interface password for Kismet dashboard access.

config_fields.name: GPS
config_fields.description: GPS configuration. Use "false" to disable, or provide a full spec like "serial:device=/dev/ttyUSB0,baud=9600".

config_fields.name: HTTP_PORT
config_fields.description: Port for the Kismet web interface.

config_fields.name: REMOTE_CAPTURE_PORT
config_fields.description: Port used for remote capture streaming.

config_fields.name: LOG_LEVEL
config_fields.description: Set the logging verbosity level (INFO, DEBUG, WARN, ERROR).
